citation: Proclamation under the Public Interest Disclosures Act 2002 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Public Interest Disclosures Act 2002

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Public Interest Disclosures Act 2002 fix 1 January 2004 as the day on which that Act commences.

1 December 2003

W. J. E. COX

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

JUDY JACKSON

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 10 December 2003

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
